scripts.zip: zip -r -x database.sql -x credentials.csv -x docker-compose.yml -x index.test.js -q lambda.zip ./*
scripts.create: dotenv -- cross-var aws lambda create-function --runtime nodejs12.x --handler index.handler --function-name %FUNCTION_NAME% --role %ARN_ROLE% --zip-file fileb://lambda.zip
scripts.deploy:code: dotenv -- cross-var aws lambda update-function-code --function-name %FUNCTION_NAME% --zip-file fileb://lambda.zip
